name: Sagar Gupta
about: I am a passionate Software Development Engineer with experience in building scalable and efficient backend systems. I have a strong background in cloud technologies and a proven track record of delivering high-quality software. I am always eager to take on new challenges and learn new technologies.

skills.name: Technologies
skills.description: Temporal, MongoDB, DynamoDB, SQL, Spanner, Scylla DB, BigQuery, Big Table, PubSub, Elasticsearch

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: This website itself, designed to be a clean, responsive, and easily updatable showcase of my skills and experience. Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it dynamically loads all content from a single JSON file. Used Gemini-cli to build this.

experience.title: SDE - 2
experience.description: Worked on US-GP Payroll migration, wrote facade gateway layer APIs, and successfully took ownership of the Germany Pensions project. Architectured features for the Australia Super Annuation system, reducing customer support tickets. Spearheaded the creation of audits for the Global Pensions platform.

experience.title: SDE - 2
experience.description: Designed, implemented, and took end-to-end ownership of major features such as Student insights, Teacher insights, and a Question correction platform used by over 200K users. Mentored SDE-1s and interns.

experience.title: SDE-1, SDE - 2
experience.description: Worked on cost optimization, including migrating tables from Cloud Spanner to Scylla DB. Wrote the user profile service from scratch in Golang. Took ownership of critical back-end services and implemented major features like Profile Albums and Profile moods. Contributed to user-facing features with over 3K requests per second in traffic.

accomplishments: Competitive Programming, Candidate Master (1958 rating) at CodeForces.
Redis, Inc | RU301: Running Redis at Scale, Redis Labs, Completed Running Redis at Scale course.
ACM ICPC International Collegiate Programming Contest, Kanpur, Secured 52 rank in Asia Kanpur ICPC Regional.
HackWithInfy, Infosys, Runner up in hackathon conducted at Infosys Pune. Also among top 109 students to qualify for the final round out of 100000+ participants.
